alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 3:06PM CDT until May 07 at 9:07AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Verdigris River at Coffeyville affecting Montgomery County. Verdigris River at Independence affecting Wilson and Montgomery Counties. For the Verdigris River...including Altoona, Independence, Coffeyville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Verdigris River at Independence. * WHEN...Until late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Some flooding of low lying areas and bottom land can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 33.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 36.9 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Verdigris River Independence 30.0 33.0 Thu 2 pm CDT 34.9 17.7 13.4 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
